info.name: Transfer
info.summary: Add a file to Nextcloud from a web link.
info.description: This app allows you to have a file from the Internet transferred directly into your Nextcloud, without first having to download it to your personal device in order to upload it. You simply enter the download link and the transfer happens on the server side, making it possible to leave downloads running in the background even when your personal computer is switched off.
info.author: Daniel Thwaites
